screens.title: Chef Portfolio Home Page
screens.prompt:
Title: Chef Portfolio Home Page
Context: Premium personal website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Desktop Home Screen. Cinematic hero section with a high-resolution close-up of a signature dish, headline 'The Art of Cultural Synthesis', and CTA 'Book an Experience'. Below, a 'Signature Highlights' section with 3 elegant cards (e.g., 'Hanoi Roots', 'Manhattan Precision', 'The Fusion'). A thin strip for accolades (Michelin mentions, James Beard) and a final CTA block. Palette: Charcoal black background, ivory text, gold accents. Editorial serif typography.
Platform: web
Form factor: desktop

screens.title: Chef Journey & Philosophy
screens.prompt:
Title: Chef Journey & Philosophy
Context: Premium personal website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Desktop About Screen. Features a sophisticated split-screen or modular timeline 'From Saigon to NYC'. Left side focuses on Vietnam roots (3 years), right side on USA high-end culinary scene (3 years). Deep wine accents for headers. Section on 'Culinary Philosophy' emphasizing ingredient-driven storytelling. A logo row at the bottom showcasing press like Eater, Food & Wine, and Vogue. High whitespace, 12-column grid.
Platform: web
Form factor: desktop

screens.title: Signature Tasting Concepts
screens.prompt:
Title: Signature Tasting Concepts
Context: Premium personal website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Desktop Signature Concepts Screen. A grid of 6 premium cards representing tasting menus (e.g., 'The Silk Road', 'Atlantic Harvest'). Each card includes a high-end image, a brief description, 'Pairing Notes' (e.g., Vintage Sake, Napa Cabs), and tags for service format (Private Dining, Pop-up, Consultation). Elegant muted gold borders and refined sans-serif body text.
Platform: web
Form factor: desktop

screens.title: Culinary Stories & Notes
screens.prompt:
Title: Culinary Stories & Notes
Context: Premium personal website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Desktop Stories/Journal Screen. An editorial-style blog layout. Large featured article card at the top about 'The Soul of Fish Sauce'. Below, a grid of smaller cards with titles like 'Autumn in the Hudson Valley' and 'The Geometry of Plating'. Focus on high-quality food photography and clean typography. Background in charcoal black (#111111) for a cinematic feel.
Platform: web
Form factor: desktop

screens.title: Booking & Inquiries
screens.prompt:
Title: Booking & Inquiries
Context: Premium personal website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Desktop Contact & Booking Screen. A minimal, upscale booking form on the left. Inquiry categories dropdown (Private Event, Brand Collaboration, Consulting). Right side lists 'Service Regions' (New York Metro, Ho Chi Minh City, International). Use of ivory background (#F8F5EF) with charcoal text for a high-contrast, clean professional look. Gold accents on buttons.
Platform: web
Form factor: desktop

screens.title: Mobile Chef Home Page
screens.prompt:
Title: Mobile Chef Home Page
Context: Premium personal mobile website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Mobile Home Screen (390px). Sticky top nav with a minimalist 'Menu' trigger. Hero section with a tall, cinematic vertical image of a signature dish, headline 'The Art of Cultural Synthesis' in ivory serif, and a large gold 'Book an Experience' CTA button. 'Signature Highlights' section with a horizontal swipable carousel of 3 elegant cards (Hanoi Roots, Manhattan Precision, The Fusion). Accolades strip with subtle gold icons for Michelin and James Beard. Palette: Charcoal black (#111111) background. Variant 1 of 5.
Platform: ios
Form factor: phone

screens.title: Mobile Journey & Philosophy
screens.prompt:
Title: Mobile Journey & Philosophy
Context: Premium personal mobile website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Mobile About Screen (390px). Vertical timeline layout 'From Saigon to NYC'. Top section features a professional chef portrait. Timeline blocks with gold vertical connectors: 'Vietnam Roots (2018-2021)' followed by 'USA Precision (2021-2024)'. 'Culinary Philosophy' section with deep wine (#5A2E2E) subheaders and refined ivory sans-serif body text. Small, clean press logo grid at the bottom (Eater, Vogue). Variant 2 of 5.
Platform: ios
Form factor: phone

screens.title: Mobile Signature Concepts
screens.prompt:
Title: Mobile Signature Concepts
Context: Premium personal mobile website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Mobile Signature Concepts Screen (390px). A vertical stack of 6 premium menu cards. Each card features a high-end food photo with a gold border, title like 'The Silk Road', a 2-line description, and 'Pairing Notes' in a small italic serif. Service format tags (e.g., 'Private Dining') displayed as elegant outline pills. High whitespace between cards for a luxury feel. Variant 3 of 5.
Platform: ios
Form factor: phone

screens.title: Mobile Culinary Stories
screens.prompt:
Title: Mobile Culinary Stories
Context: Premium personal mobile website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Mobile Stories Screen (390px). Editorial feed layout. Featured story at the top with a large image and gold headline 'The Soul of Fish Sauce'. Below, a list of cards for 'Autumn in Hudson' and 'Plating Geometry', each with a small square thumbnail on the left and title/excerpt on the right. Dark background (#111111) with ivory text (#F8F5EF). Variant 4 of 5.
Platform: ios
Form factor: phone

screens.title: Mobile Booking & Contact
screens.prompt:
Title: Mobile Booking & Contact
Context: Premium personal mobile website for an experienced fine-dining chef with a cross-cultural background (USA & Vietnam).
Description of the screen: Mobile Contact Screen (390px). Premium booking form with grouped fields (Name, Event Type, Date, Guest Count). Dropdown for inquiry categories with gold chevron. Service regions listed below in a clean ivory-on-charcoal list (NYC, Saigon, Global). Large, thumb-friendly 'Submit Inquiry' button in muted gold (#C6A15B). Clean, high-contrast professional look. Variant 5 of 5.
Platform: ios
Form factor: phone
